(2,): As a FABS user, I want to submit a FABS file to the system, so that I can upload my agency's data As a FABS user, I want to check the status of my submission, so that I can track the progress of my uploaded file As a FABS user, I want to download the uploaded FABS file, so that I can access my agency's data As a Data user, I want to access two additional fields from the FPDS data pull, so that I can gather more detailed information As a Data user, I want to receive updates to FABS records, so that I can stay informed about changes to the data As a FABS loader user, I want to derive fields for the FABS loader, so that I can prepare the data for loading As a FABS loader user, I want to include FREC derivations in the historical FABS data loader, so that I can include detailed information
(1,): As a Broker user, I want to upload and validate a file, so that I can ensure the data is accurate and error-free As a D files generator user, I want to manage and cache D files generation requests, so that I can optimize the generation process As a system administrator, I want to generate and validate D files from FABS and FPDS data, so that I can ensure the accuracy and integrity of the data
(0,): As a Broker user, I want to submit records for individual recipients, so that I can update their information As a Developer, I want to add updates to a FABS submission, so that I can modify the data when the publish status changes As a Developer, I want to update the FABS sample file, so that I can remove unnecessary information As a Developer, I want to prevent duplicate transactions from being published, so that I can maintain data integrity As a USASpending user, I want to access raw agency published files from FABS, so that I can gather detailed information about agency spending
(3,): As a User Interface Designer, I want to move on to round 2 of DABS or FABS landing page edits, so that I can improve the user experience As a User Interface Designer, I want to track issues in Tech Thursday, so that I can identify and resolve problems As a User Interface Designer, I want to schedule user testing, so that I can gather feedback and improve the system
